<row gap="medium">

<row gap="medium">

**Hardness** 3

**HP (BT)** 6 (3)
</row>

---

This very small shield is a favorite of duelists and quick, lightly armored warriors. It's typically made of steel and strapped to your forearm. You can [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) with your buckler as long as you have that hand free or are holding a light object that's not a weapon in that hand.

<title level="2">Specific Magic Shields</title>
[Floating Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2819), [Glamorous Buckler](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3279), [Reflecting Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2825)
name: Buckler
